mapper.select: SELECT /* com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.ChngHstDao.selectListCount */ COUNT(1) FROM TB_SYS_CHNG_HST A INNER JOIN TB_SYS_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID INNER JOIN TB_SYS_USER_BAS C ON A.REGR_ID = C.USER_ID

SELECT /* com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.ChngHstDao.selectList */ A.* , ( WITH RECURSIVE MM AS ( SELECT 1 AS LEVEL , MENU_NM MENU_PATH , M.MENU_ID , M.MENU_NM , M.PRNTS_MENU_ID , M.MENU_LVL_NO FROM tb_sys_menu_bas M WHERE MENU_LVL_NO = 2 UNION ALL SELECT level + 1 AS level , CONCAT( MENU_PATH,'>',M.MENU_NM) MENU_PATH , M.MENU_ID , M.MENU_NM , M.PRNTS_MENU_ID , M.MENU_LVL_NO FROM MM INNER JOIN tb_sys_menu_bas M ON MM.MENU_ID= M.PRNTS_MENU_ID ) SELECT MENU_PATH FROM MM WHERE MENU_ID = A.MENU_ID ) MENU_PATH FROM (
SELECT A.CHNG_HST_ID /*변경이력코드 */ , A.MENU_ID /*메뉴코드 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_URL /*변경호출URL */
, A.CHNG_RSLT_TXN /*변경결과내역 */ , A.CHNG_PARAM_TXN /*변경파라미터내역 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_TXN /*변경호출내역 */
, A.CHNG_CALL_DT /*변경호출일시 */ , A.CHNG_EXEC_MSEC /*변경실행밀리초 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_IP_ADDR /*변경호출IP주소 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , A.REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , A.AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , B.MENU_NM , C.USER_ID , C.USER_NM , C.LOGIN_ID FROM TB_SYS_CHNG_HST A INNER JOIN TB_SYS_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID INNER JOIN TB_SYS_USER_BAS C ON A.REGR_ID = C.USER_ID
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
) A
